revised_title: Therosuchia: A Reevaluation of Fossil Reptilia Classification and Palate Evidence
tldr: The author examines the structure, organization, and classification of fossil reptiles, specifically focusing on the Therosuchia group. By analyzing the palate and dentition of various specimens, the author reevaluates the classification of this group and identifies key differences between specimens, leading to a better understanding of the Therosuchia's characteristics and relationships.
